summary: The state of Texas is divided into 254 counties.
full_text:
William Beck Ochiltree , was a settler, judge, and legislator in Texas. In 1963, Recorded Texas Historic Landmark Number 967, honoring Colonel Ochiltree, was placed at the courthouse in Perryton.
^ "Colonel William B. Ochiltree - Perryton, Ochiltree County, Texas". Recorded Texas Historic Landmark. William Nienke, Sam Morrow. Retrieved 19 February 2011.
title: William Beck Ochiltree
